content: snow-farmer: Merged a single significant PR #842 "feat: add avalanche plugin" that added the Avalanche plugin, involving extensive code changes (+177,519/-78,374 lines) across 791 files. The contribution was substantial but concentrated, with activity on only 3 days this month. The work primarily focused on new feature development (58%) with some bugfix and refactoring components (17% each), mostly affecting code (70%) and configuration files (25%).
